profile:
YOU DREAM IT - WE BUILD IT - 2 WEEKS - WE WILL BEAT ANY COMPETITORS WRITTEN PRICE QUOTATION BY A MINIMUM OF 5% - NO QUESTIONS ASKED - JUST CONTACT US

Finished Basement.ca, (ISM Renobuilders Inc.) is a family-owned and operated business. We specialize in basement renovations providing our customers with a finished basement that is professionally-built with high quality products and materials and finished with old-world craftsmanship, pride and attention to detail. 

Thinking about a Basement Renovation?

Finishedbasement.ca has been providing exceptional basement renovation services in the GTA since 1996. Converting people's dark damp basement's into clean, comfortable and fun living spaces.

We also offer unique, custom designs and consolations in interior decorating provided directly by the founder and owner, who personally oversees and manages all projects. 

Come visit our 3000sq. ft. showroom located in Mississauga. We have just recently added a new addition featuring: Limestone, Marble, Infrared Sauna's, Steam Shower Display and LED Lighting!!!!! 

Also offering in-house Audio Visual solutions by: Pure Custom Integrations. WHo help you understand tomorrows technology TODAY! Specializing in: Home Theatres, Home Automation, Home Integration....and more!

Unable to make it out to our showroom? No problem! Visit our website to explore more photos, video testimonials and our blog.


Thank you from the Finished Basement Crew for taking the time to check us out!

profile:
Bathroom Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Basement Renovation

Our process begins in the comfort of your home with a complimentary consultation. A qualified renovator will take you through our virtual gallery showing off hundreds of inspirational ideas featuring real kitchen & bathroom renovations we have completed, or are capable of offering. Have something else in mind? Splendid! We are sleuths at sourcing hard-to-find products. Together, we’ll discover functional solutions and fashionable options that suit your tastes. Once this process is complete, we’ll present you with a quote and a comprehensive plan encompassing the layout, products and details of your renovation.

As soon as you give us the green light to begin your project, we will prepare a detailed contract and a comfortable payment schedule.Then you can sit back and leave the rest to us! One of our Project Managers will coordinate with our team of skilled drywallers, carpenters, plumbers and electricians so that your dream kitchen or bathroom renovation runs smoothly. In our experience, dealing with one person is much easier for you and ensures the job is done right – the first time!

During the renovation process, rest assured we will treat your home as if it was our own. From drop sheets to vent filters, we’ll create a “bubble” around the project area to keep the space clean with minimal disruption to your household. Upon completion of the project, a cleaning crew will ensure your new kitchen or bathroom is pristine – ready to enjoy immediately – and for years to come.

For added peace of mind, we are proud to guarantee all our Toronto kitchen and bathroom renovation work for 5 years. That’s our commitment and it’s what makes the Kitchen & Bath Guys the definitive choice for discriminating homeowners… like you!

profile:
Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. All Euro Choice Windows & Doors products are built to strict specifications and are regularly inspected for operation and craftsmanship. All our staff is professional and courteous with many years of experience. Since we do not use sub-contractors we have a reputation for consistency and quality. This reputation took nearly 20 years to build and we are proud to see our windows and doors in your home. 

Services: Windows Installation & Insulation
Doors Installation & Insulation

profile:
We're  more then just handy. We are more then just handymen.
We are skilled trade professionals with a passion.

We're  always looking forward to our next project big or small and going beyond my customer's expectations and needs.
My brother and I saw the need and demand for reliable hard working tradesmen  with an eye for perfection.  
Our contractors are skilled in many aspects of the trades to complete all kinds of jobs BIG or SMALL.
 Sometimes we need to think out side the box like a true handy man! and other times you need to stick to the book!
​
We started  this  business to help improve, repair, &  maintain the value of people’s biggest investments, their homes!

profile:
After working closely with a various of local contractors, we realized why customers are often left disappointed and completely unsatisfied with received services. Lack of customer support, poor product demonstration, inability to take responsibility for projects, as well as hardships upon work delivery made them step up and try to make a change in the industry. That's how the RenoDuck Basements was born.
–––
Through the use of modern technologies, discipline, strict standards and processes, RenoDuck Basements successfully works with tight deadlines, delivers a high-quality product, and matches it up with exceptional service throughout the whole process.
–––
- Upon arrival, we give you a free consultation, a free 3D design on the spot!
- We specialize in Basement Renovation, Bathroom Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Home Improvement, and House Renovation.
- While being a one-stop shop, we employ top-notch professionals who may not only deliver a high-quality work but also are a pleasure to work and communicate with.
- Do not hesitate and reach out to book your FREE Estimate at +1 (647) 245-2405 or at https://www.renoduck.com
–––

profile:
Level Up Basement goal is customer satisfaction, we know that every happy client brings 3 more contracts, and this is how we grew for 10 year of company existence.

That’s why we focus on quality assurance in everything: choosing the best materials, minimizing our response time to one hour max, always staying within our promised roadmap and never delaying projects.

Our approach is a “boutique style” dedicated management. Mike, company owner, always consults with the customer for every stage of the project, checking his teams progress on each location on a daily basis, doesn’t allow any small detail to escape his expert eye.

We choose the best designers, only licensed trade workers and work in every basement as if it were our house.

profile:
Thank you for visiting HTR Basements. As one of GTA's leading basement finishing and basement contractors, we are committed to providing our customers with unparalleled value.
***
Our master craftsmen and our passion are what sets us apart from other basement finishing companies.
Basement finishing is a big investment, and it’s important to make a well-informed decision when it comes to choosing a basement contractor. High Tech Reno is fully insured, licensed, and has the experience to deliver quality finished basements. We specialize in basement designing, basement finishing, and remodeling basements in the GTA and surrounding areas. A finished basement can be a real asset to your home’s long-term equity and provide functional new living space for your family to enjoy. Entertainment areas and playrooms are perfect solutions for growing families. Home offices, exercise rooms, and additional bedrooms are also popular choices for homeowners looking for more usable living space. Whatever your needs are for your basement finishing project, our basement specialists can meet your needs with the perfectly finished basement. Contact us today at 905-754-4696 to get a free estimate and start your basement remodeling process.
***
HTR Basements experts provide quality basement renovation services throughout the GTA. HTR Basements is The Best Basement Renovation company with a mission: Give customers the best basements, bathrooms and kitchens, at the most affordable price without compromising quality and service. When GTA homeowners choose High Tech Renovation as their Basement Finishing contractor, they are pleasantly surprised by our personal approach to the remodeling process and our dedication to their comfort and enjoyment throughout each stage. We treat each and every job as if it were in our own home.
***
We look forward to adding you and your basement to our ever-growing list of basement remodeling successes!

profile:
At Harmony Basements, we help you turn your dream basement into a reality. We pride ourselves on working in perfect harmony with our clients to understand their vision and to meet their needs. We are industry leaders with over 20 years experience in providing our clients professionally designed finished basements. We are champions of green building solutions, and leading the way in providing energy-efficient, 100% eco-friendly and mould-free solutions to our valued clients in the GTA and beyond.
 
All of Our Basements Are:
 
● Done with building permits and electrical inspections
● Built to last™ with waterproofed and mould-free sustainable Wall boards & engineer vinyl plank floors
● Protected by our transferable lifetime Warranty 
 
Our Free In-Home Consultation Includes:
 
● Free 3D Render Design (Detailed architectural, electrical and mechanical drawings)
● Free Itemized & Transparent Quote (Detailed scope of work included)
● ⋆⋆⋆NEW⋆⋆⋆ Free Virtual Reality Tour - Immersive 3D Design Experience Found Nowhere Else!
(You can now submerge yourself in the design model we'll create together. You got to see it to believe it...) 
 
⋆⋆⋆ REQUEST YOUR FREE DESIGN CONSULTATION ⋆⋆⋆
Call Today or Click the GET A QUOTE button now

profile:
With over 30 years experience, Masonry Doctors are a leading masonry contractor in Toronto. Our services include Chimney Builds & Repairs, Roofing, Guttering, All Masonry Services, Patios, Walkways, Stairs, Steps, Basement & Foundation.

Browse through Masonry Doctors latest masonry, chimney, and concrete projects. Take a look at our recent work and see for yourself the quality of work we provide. Contact us today for a FREE estimate!

Do you need to have your existing outdoor masonry features repaired? Turn to the professionals from Masonry Doctors for all  your masonry restoration needs.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

If you love spending time outdoors, a patio is a must-have feature for your home. The team from Masonry Doctors can custom-design a patio for you.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Whether you have damaged concrete or a cracked foundation, the team from Masonry Doctors can repair it for you. Get 15% OFF our services.

Veneer facades and pillars can transform the appearance of any property. Trust us to upgrade your home with quality pillars and columns. Request a call back today!

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

Having completed hundreds of residential basements and bathroom projects across the GTA, our team is switching gears to focus on local geographics within the Region of Durham.

So when it comes to completing your renovation the safest way, and creating a beautiful space in your home, no one knows better than EJP! profile:
East Pro Contracting Group offers commercial and residential services in the east GTA and surrounding areas. 

With over 15 years of experience renovating kitchens, bathrooms, basements, offices and more, we provide all the necessary resources to assist with preparing creative designs as well as managing and completing your project on budget, on time and with the highest level of quality workmanship. 

Whether we are drawing inspiration from modern trends, finding unique solutions to renovation challenges or simply creating a space that showcases your true colours, we can help to customize a plan and create a budget for your next project!

Service areas include (but not necessarily limited to) Scarborough, East York, North York, Markham, Stouffville, Claremont, Uxbridge, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Courtice, Bowmanville.

profile:
Thank you for looking at our profile.  We are working hard to achieve first-class ratings with Homestars.  We have been in the construction and home renovation business for years, and have recently signed up with Homestars. 

We treat all customers like family, and our motto is... "Do it right the first time..."

The INTEGRITY PROPERTY GROUP GIVES you our assurance that our professional installation crew will be friendly, neat and courteous as they complete your on-site installation and we clean up when we’re through. If you have any questions or needs that we might help you with please give us a call any time.”

We want to earn your business...!  Our business is based on reviews and referrals...

We are located in central Peterborough, however, we can handle jobs within a one hour radius, which would include a good part of cottage country (Kawartha's) and also Durham region, as well as part of Northumberland County.

It would be our pleasure to provide you with a free quote, to understand the scope of the work required, and to give you professional services.

Our specialties include the following;

* Deck Design and Installation
* Fence & Gate
* Pergola Design and Installation
* Building Sheds / Cabanas
* Landscape and Interlock
* General Home Renovations

Thank you for looking at our profile and we hope that we have the opportunity of working with you and your family on your next project.

profile:
ARLEO Renovation & Contracting Inc. is the one stop for all of your home office renovations needs. 
As a full-service contractor, we have the experience and proven skills to take on all your home renovation requirements and complete the project so it’s done right, on time and within budget.
Our experienced, trained professionals make it easy for ARLEO Renovation & Contraction Inc. to stand behind every job we do. At ARLEO Renovation & Contraction Inc., we strive to implement a long-term relationship with our clients, based on safety, quality, timely service and an anticipation of their needs. So, if there’s a renovation in your future, contact ARLEO Renovation & Contracting Inc. today, where 100% total satisfaction is guaranteed!
Our Home renovation business services mainly cover GTA area. Whether you live in Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto or the surrounding area, trust your home renovation to The ARLEO Renovation & Contracting Inc.!
